subject: Golf
organizations: La Cantera Golf Clubs Resort Course
lead_paragraph: Zach Johnson won the Texas Open in San Antonio for his fourth PGA Tour title. He followed his third-round 62 with a six-under-par 64 for a two-stroke victory over Charlie Wi, Mark Wilson and Tim Wilkinson. Johnson had a 19-under 261 total on La Cantera Golf Club’s Resort Course.
